author: Jamie Jones
excerpt: Manchester United are determined to sign Viktor Gyokeres from Sporting CP in the summer transfer window, according to Fichajes. text: Manchester United are determined to sign Viktor Gyokeres from Sporting CP in the summer transfer window, according to Fichajes. The report has claimed that Man United are ready to offer £60million for the Sweden international striker, with manager Ruben Amorim personally keen on bringing the striker to Old Trafford. Gyokeres is one of the best strikers in Europe and has been superb for Sporting CP since he joined from Coventry City in 2023. The 27-year-old scored 54 goals and gave 13 assists in 52 appearances for Sporting last season. Gyokeres found the back of the net 43 times and provided 15 assists in 50 matches in all competitions in the 2023-24 campaign. The report has claimed: ‘Manchester United doesn’t want to wait any longer and is going all out for Viktor Gyökeres.’ Man Utd finished 15th in the Premier League table last season and also reached the final of the UEFA Europa League. Meanwhile, Sporting CP won the Portuguese league title last season and will play in the UEFA Champions League in the 2023/24 campaign.
html:
Manchester United are determined to sign Viktor Gyokeres from Sporting CP in the summer transfer window, according to Fichajes. The report has claimed that Man United are ready to offer £60million for the Sweden international striker, with manager Ruben Amorim personally keen on bringing the striker to Old Trafford.

Gyokeres is one of the best strikers in Europe and has been superb for Sporting CP since he joined from Coventry City in 2023. The 27-year-old scored 54 goals and gave 13 assists in 52 appearances for Sporting last season. Gyokeres found the back of the net 43 times and provided 15 assists in 50 matches in all competitions in the 2023-24 campaign.

The report has claimed: ‘Manchester United doesn’t want to wait any longer and is going all out for Viktor Gyökeres.’

Man Utd finished 15th in the Premier League table last season and also reached the final of the UEFA Europa League. Meanwhile, Sporting CP won the Portuguese league title last season and will play in the UEFA Champions League in the 2023/24 campaign.
